original_text: For then the king of Babylon's army besieged Jerusalem: and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up in the court of the prison, which was in the king of Judah's house.
korean_text: 그 때에 바벨론 군대는 예루살렘을 에워싸고 선지자 예레미야는 유다의 왕의 궁중에 있는 시위대 뜰에 갇혔으니

sentences.original_text: For then the king of Babylon's army besieged Jerusalem:
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바빌론 왕의 군대가 예루살렘을 포위했으니

sentences.original_text: and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up
in the court of the prison,
which was in the king of Judah's house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 유다 왕의 집 안에 있었더라.
